alert.note: Alert for Beaufort (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 10:05AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG CONTINUES ACROSS EASTERN PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT COUNTY... Visibilities will slowly improve across eastern portions of Beaufort County through 1115 AM. Visibilities will drop as low as 1/4 mile at times for locations such as Dale, Beaufort, Hunting Island, Fripp Island, Parris Island, Ashdale and the far northern portions of Hilton Head Island. This includes much of the Broad River. Motorists in these areas should be alert for low visibilities.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed. Mariners in the Broad River are urged to navigate with extreme care. If you must navigate in these conditions, proceed with caution. Use proper fog signals, including fog horns. Make sure all navigational running lights are on.
